title: Academic Set 14 — Smart Homes & Youth Engagement
description: Process diagram on smart home energy management and an agree/disagree essay on youth councils.

task1.title: Smart home energy system
task1.prompt: The diagram illustrates how a smart home energy management system distributes electricity generated by rooftop solar panels, battery storage, and the national grid. Summarise the information by describing the main stages and how the system works.
hints: Describe the flow of energy from generation to household appliances.
Explain the role of the battery during peak and off-peak times.
Include how excess energy is handled by the system.

task2.title: Agree/disagree essay — Youth councils
task2.prompt: Some cities have created youth councils to involve teenagers in local decision-making. Do you think young people should have a formal role in shaping city policies?
outline: Introduction: paraphrase the idea and state your opinion.
Body paragraph 1: arguments supporting youth participation (fresh perspectives, civic skills).
Body paragraph 2: potential drawbacks or conditions needed for success.
Conclusion: reaffirm your view and suggest how to implement youth councils effectively.
